interestingFact: The U.S. has the world's largest economy.
India is the world’s largest democracy.
China is home to the Great Wall, visible from space under special conditions.
Germany is the world’s third-largest exporter.
London has the world’s oldest underground railway system.
France is the most visited country in the world.
Brazil has the Amazon rainforest, the largest tropical rainforest on Earth.
Canada has the longest coastline of any country.
Australia is home to unique animals like kangaroos and koalas.
